text: Hassan Ebrahim Habibi (, 29 January 1937 â€“ 31 January 2013) was an Iranian politician, lawyer and scholar. He was the first vice president from 1989 until 2001 under Presidents Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani and Mohammad Khatami. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Vice presidents of Iran Category:Politicians from Tehran Category:Iranian lawyers
